item.description:
You are invited to the NorthShore MA pug meetup
When: The 2nd Saturday of every month (Rain or Shine)
Time: 9:00am-11:00am
Where:
134R Newbury Street
Peabody, MA 01960

The Boston K9 facility has agreed to host our pug meets. The space has a large indoor play area and an attached outdoor play area and both are fully enclosed. All pugs can be off leash and safe.
Cost is $5 per Pug, $3 additional family Pug.
All dogs must have record of immunizations on file.  
Please bring a copy of record with you to the next pug meet so it can be put on file.

All small breed dogs are welcome.
Please no aggressive/dominant dogs.

meetup organizer: Jodi Webster
jwebster@mitre.org


Thanks everyone!

group.name: The Northshore MA Pug Meetup Group

item.name: April's Pug Meetup
